data.text: @TaleSpun And yeah you can read it standalone. I read everything up to infinity countdown and I really liked it myself. Some movie isms like quill listening to music a lot, but real fun outside of that with a nice rotation of artists. Kinda bummed it led to a big event but eh, marvel
@TaleSpun Or Lemire, Waid, etc lol they had a real bad issue with that for a while so I'm a bit concerned. Hopefully it's managed well since they've been making good moves lately

@tyrantraveomega Yeah, please don’t be like Bendis and Soule with that lol.

I actually have All New Guardians, so I may as well read it. I don’t need the other runs, do I? Trying to stay away from massive runs for a bit lol

@TaleSpun All new guardians was pretty great actually, I'd recommend it. Haven't read the Infinity stuff since there's a lot but I'm gonna go through it once it's cheap

This should be good but I hope Cates isn't overworking it with all the ongoings he's on. He should be a nice fit though
